17 Dec, 2011

EDUS2 and Thermomulator work

Over the past few days I’ve completed some of the pending work on the EDUS2 project. The prototype has been working for sometime, but now the code has been uploaded to github and a basic description has been submitted. A full description with images, instructions for building, material, and a usage video will follow shortly.

The thermomulator code has been completed and uploaded. It’s pretty basic. The trickier part is squeezing it into a box that looks like a thermometer, this is almost done just waiting for the drill to recharge to finish putting some holes in the cases to connect the sensors. Maybe a drill press should be added to the Christmas list?
